text: boiji anhneun geos-ui yeolsoedeul-i hananimkke issnani geubun oeeneun a mudo geugeos-eul alji moshanila geubun eun ttang-wie issneun geosgwa bada-e issneunmodeun geos-eul algo gyesimyeo tteol-eojineun namus-ipdo daejiui eodumsog-e issneun gogsig han-aldo singsinghan geosgwa maleun geosdo geubunkkeseo moleusineun geos-i eobs-eu ni geugeos-eun seongseoe gilogdoeeo issno la
